public class MeetingService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service layer for meetings' business logic.

      • createReport

        public Meeting createReport(Meeting meeting,
                            java.util.List<Topic> comments,
                            java.util.List<Malfunction> malfunctions,
                            java.util.List<Survey> surveys,
                            java.lang.String reportComment)
        Creates a report for building's meeting.
        Parameters:
        meeting - meeting for which report is created
        comments - list of comments for meeting's topics
        malfunctions - list of malfunctions that occurred since last meeting
        surveys - list of surveys that were answered since last meeting
        reportComment - overall report comment
        Returns:
        meeting containing its report
